mapper.update: update deliveryplace set mgl_id = #{mglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dep_name = #{depName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_name = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mg_name = #{mgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dep_tel = #{depTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dep_addr = #{depAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dep_id = #{depId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select dep_id, mgl_id, dep_name, province_name, city_name, mg_name, dep_tel, dep_addr, Comment from deliveryplace where dep_id = #{depId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select dep_id, mgl_id, dep_name, province_name, city_name, mg_name, dep_tel, dep_addr, Comment from deliveryplace
